name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-bot-ai-virtual-assistant-nodejs
title: Build an AI superbot that calls sub/child bots using Azure Open AI
shortDescription: This sample bot demonstrates the skill consumer bot (Virtual Assistant) that routes user inputs to Echo and AI skill bots for tailored responses.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates the skill consumer bot (Virtual Assistant) that uses the Teams AI library to route user inputs to Echo and AI skill bots, returning tailored responses to enhance productivity.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX demonstrating a skill consumer bot that routes user messages to Echo and AI skill bots, which then process and return tailored responses.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
